welcome.title: Welcome to Hagicode Desktop
welcome.description: Hagicode Desktop is the local launcher for Hagicode, allowing you to quickly use Hagicode locally. We'll help you complete the first-time installation and configuration in about 3-5 minutes.

manage.description: Manage Hagicode Server installation and updates

skip.manualInstallNote:
After skipping, you can:
• Manually install Hagicode Server through "Package Management" in the main interface
• Re-enable the setup process in settings
